synthesis_conditions.temperature: 0 (cid:14)C for diazotization and azidation, room temperature for stirring

solvents.name: water
solvents.amount: 50 ml for sodium nitrite solution, 50 ml for sodium azide solution, 500 ml for 5-aminoisophthalic acid solution

synthesis_conditions.time: 15 min for diazotization, 30 min at 0 (cid:14)C and 12 h at room temperature for azidation

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: evaporated to dryness, subjected to recycling preparative size-exclusion chromatography with tetrahydrofuran as an eluent

synthesis_conditions.temperature: room temperature for crystallization, 120 (cid:14)C for drying

solvents.name: MeOH
solvents.amount: 2 ml for H2N3-ipa and bpy solution

synthesis_conditions.time: a few days for crystallization, 6 h for drying
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heated under high vacuum (below 10(cid:0)2 Pa) at 120 (cid:14)C
